attributes.action:
To enforce a clean air scheme in Greater Manchester
(school project)
attributes.additional_details: We would like to see this change because it has seen great success in London with 97% of cars now being ULEZ - compliant, allowing for an improved environment, and for the money to be reinvested into society.
attributes.background: We would like a clean air scheme like ULEZ/Congestion Charge operating in Greater Manchester which currently does not have one.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

It is for Greater Manchester to decide on the plan it would like to propose.

You can find out more on the Clean Air Greater Manchester website:

https://cleanairgm.com/
